title: Speed, Distance, and Time Relationship
text: Given that v represents speed, $$t$$ represents time, and $$d$$ represents distance. What is the relationship between speed, distance, and time?
speech: Given that v represents speed,  t  represents time, and  d  represents distance. What is the relationship between speed, distance, and time?
pacedSpeech: Given that v represents speed,   t
represents distance. What is the relationship between speed, distance, and time?

title: Plug-in Values
text: Plug in known value of distance into the equation.
speech: Plug in known value of distance into the equation.
pacedSpeech: Plug in known value of distance into the equation.

title: Re-write Equation
text: What is the equation in terms of velocity?
speech: What is the equation in terms of velocity?
